lines.text: DRAFT III 2/8 EXECCMTE ... FEBEXEC ON SDRIVE
THANK YOU, BILL. ON BEHALF OF THE T-I STAFF, I WELCOME JIM MORGAN.
JIM, WE LOOK FORWARD TO WORKING WITH YOU AND BILL IN THE DAYS
AHEAD.
THREE MONTHS AGO TODAY, THE VOTERS SENT A MESSAGE: WE WANT MORE
EFFICIENT ... AND LESS ... GOVERNMENT IN OUR DAILY LIVES. THAT
BROUGHT A WHOLE NEW GROUP TO CAPITOL HILL.
SINCE THE ELECTIONS, THE TOBACCO INSTITUTE HAS UNDERTAKEN A PROGRAM
TO GET QUR VERSION OF THAT MESSAGE TO THE NEW MEMBERS OF CONGRESS
... TO MAKE SURE THEY KNOW MORE ABOUT OUR INDUSTRY THAN JUST WHAT
THEY READ IN THE NEWSPAPERS.
TO DATE, WE HAVE BRIEFED TWO-THIRDS OF THE 99 NEW MEMBERS OF THE
HOUSE AND SENATE ON TOBACCO ISSUES. OUR LEGISLATIVE CONFERENCE IS
HELPING RE-INFORCE OUR MESSAGES AND WIDEN OUR CONTACTS.
NOW IT IS TIME TO CONSIDER QUR AGENDA. IN DECEMBER I SAID WE HAD
ONE ... RELY ON THE NEW CONGRESS TO
TWO CHOICES.
WE COULD ...
STOP SERIOUS ANTI-TOBACCO BILLS; OR WE COULD ... TWO ... USE THIS
OPENING TO IMPROVE THE CLIMATE FOR FUTURE YEARS ... WE COULD USE
THIS TIME TO TRY AND GET AHEAD. THERE WAS UNANIMOUS AGREEMENT ON
LOOKING FOR OPPORTUNITIES.

full_text:
DRAFT III 2/8 EXECCMTE ... FEBEXEC ON SDRIVE
THANK YOU, BILL. ON BEHALF OF THE T-I STAFF, I WELCOME JIM MORGAN.
JIM, WE LOOK FORWARD TO WORKING WITH YOU AND BILL IN THE DAYS
AHEAD.
THREE MONTHS AGO TODAY, THE VOTERS SENT A MESSAGE: WE WANT MORE
EFFICIENT ... AND LESS ... GOVERNMENT IN OUR DAILY LIVES. THAT
BROUGHT A WHOLE NEW GROUP TO CAPITOL HILL.
SINCE THE ELECTIONS, THE TOBACCO INSTITUTE HAS UNDERTAKEN A PROGRAM
TO GET QUR VERSION OF THAT MESSAGE TO THE NEW MEMBERS OF CONGRESS
... TO MAKE SURE THEY KNOW MORE ABOUT OUR INDUSTRY THAN JUST WHAT
THEY READ IN THE NEWSPAPERS.
TO DATE, WE HAVE BRIEFED TWO-THIRDS OF THE 99 NEW MEMBERS OF THE
HOUSE AND SENATE ON TOBACCO ISSUES. OUR LEGISLATIVE CONFERENCE IS
HELPING RE-INFORCE OUR MESSAGES AND WIDEN OUR CONTACTS.
([[[{PAUSE }]]]}
NOW IT IS TIME TO CONSIDER QUR AGENDA. IN DECEMBER I SAID WE HAD
ONE ... RELY ON THE NEW CONGRESS TO
TWO CHOICES.
WE COULD ...
STOP SERIOUS ANTI-TOBACCO BILLS; OR WE COULD ... TWO ... USE THIS
OPENING TO IMPROVE THE CLIMATE FOR FUTURE YEARS ... WE COULD USE
THIS TIME TO TRY AND GET AHEAD. THERE WAS UNANIMOUS AGREEMENT ON
LOOKING FOR OPPORTUNITIES.
TCAL0405568
